title: A Murderous Affair in Horizon Tower
overview: The story of two police officers working together to solve a complicated case surrounding the murder of a beautiful woman.Zhong Mei Bao is a beautiful coffee shop owner who dies mysteriously. As Zhong Jing Guo and Yang Rui Sen launch their investigation, they come across a slew of possible suspects from someone in real estate, an agent, a novelist, a white-collar worker to many other distinct personalities. With one death and eight different stories, can the officers solve the case? What kind of person was Mei Bao and who killed her? Â
